title: [HIDE AND SEEK] OCE 2015 S5 (Will update. Discuss; rules aren't final)
body:
For people who can't be bothered reading, the really important parts are in bold; however, the other parts balance the game mode.

**Complain about things you don't like.**

This is the season 5 rule set for the custom game mode Hide and Seek.

**Map:** The Crystal Scar
**Mode:** Draft pick
**Team size:** 5 hiders vs 2 seekers
**Game time:** 40 minutes or when all five hiders have died 5 times each

**Don't capture any points**
**Clairvoyance is banned**

Perma bans are dictated by the host before the game starts if any.

**Seekers:** **Find and kill each of the hiders 5 times as a team**

You can't leave the base before 2 minutes.
You can't camp the hider's spawn.
You can't kill a hider during their 30 second grace period.

You can't buy more than one Oracle's Extract per seeker team.
You can't buy Oracle's extract before 15 minutes.
{{item:2047}} 

You can't buy more than one vision item per seeker team.
You can't buy any vision item before 15 minutes.
{{item:3187}} {{item:3185}} {{item:3159}} 

You can't buy more than one slow item per seeker teem.
You can't buy any slow item before 20 minutes.
{{item:3022}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3144}} {{item:3184}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3290}} {{item:3092}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3800}} 

Apart from the above there are no item bans for seekers.

You can't cancel your re-call.

If you are less than 300 or 10% hp (whichever is greater) as a seeker you must go back to base or you're at risk of being killed by the hiders. 
You can always push it, but after that point if you continue to seek you are fair game.

**This is not an excuse for hiders to kill seekers. Seekers should always be looking to avoid hiders.**

**Hiders:** **Avoid dying 5 times each in 40 minutes**

**You can only use hard cc abilities (SLOW, STUN, ROOT, PULL, KNOCKBACK, FEAR, SUPPRESS, STASIS, TAUNT, KNOCKUP) and movement abilities on seekers and whatever abilities you like on yourself and your team.**
This does not include cc that requires non cc abilities or non cc auto attacks to hit seekers. 
This includes summoner spells. {{summoner:14}}
You can't auto attack seekers unless that auto attack directly triggers hard cc.
Abilities that only silence, blind, slow attack speed, interrupt casting or give vision are not allowed as this is soft cc.

**You must leave the base by 2 minutes**

Do not help the seekers in any way.

5 deaths as a hider: You can't interact in any way with the game any more. Close the game and log in to an alt account. 
If you must stay, don't go into the fog and don't get anywhere near the seekers. This gives an unfair advantage to the hiders (vision and blocking abilities).

You can't go back to base once you leave.
You can only buy items while dead.
You can't interrupt a seeker's recall.
You can't kill seekers. (be aware of your burst and the seeker's health)
If seekers are under 300hp or 10% hp (whichever is greater) and still seeking hiders, they are fair game. This is not an excuse to kill seekers, but you are allowed to defend yourself. Let them recall.

Buy items with lower damage stats unless you gain defensive bonuses or extra cc from those stats (shields, movement speed, slow% etc...)
For example: buy a Zephyr {{item:3172}} instead of Luden's Echo {{item:3285}} for 10% ms; you get tenacity and cooldown reduction as well.

Upon respawning you have 30 seconds in which seekers are not allowed to harm you. Say grace in chat when you respawn so everyone knows how long you have. If you are hit during grace, go back to base to heal and reset the timer/say grace in chat. 

If you take any action other than movement during grace it is nullified. 
This includes taking the storm shield, capturing a point, casting a spell, auto attacking and intentionally following a seeker.

No more than one trap per brush
No more than two seekers per brush

**The best way to deal with trolls**
This game heavily relies on a bond of trust between hiders and seekers.

Because there is no in game moderation:
If you are a non troll majority, end the game and add the troll to a ban list before rehosting.
If you are a non troll minority, just quit and log in on an alt account. Let them enjoy their failed game.
If you think you can play despite the troll/s, add and subtract minutes and lives as you see fit.

If hiders leave split their lives evenly between the remaining players.

**MAJOR CHANGE SUMMARY 20151009**
No slow items for hiders (Avoids the great Rylais debate).
Frozen heart doesn't count as a slow item.
No perma bans unless host specifies.
Clear on multiple ability CC.
Fiddles nerf.
No damage reduction or healing abilities if they damage seekers.
Clear and consistent definition of soft CC.
Movement abilities allowed even if they damage.
